thread.title: Ukrainian Bradley Crew Triumphs Over Russian T-90M Tank in Combat
thread.title_full: Ukrainian Bradley Crew Triumphs Over Russian T-90M Tank in Combat

author: BNN Correspondents
title: Ukrainian Bradley Crew Triumphs Over Russian T-90M Tank in Combat
text:
Storm Juan Wreaks Havoc in Northern Spain, Leaving Hundreds Stranded
Ukrainian Bradley Crew Triumphs Over Russian T-90M Tank in Combat
In an unprecedented showcase of military prowess, a Ukrainian Bradley fighting vehicle crew triumphed over a Russian T-90M tank, a machine previously extolled by Russian President Vladimir Putin as the ‘world’s best tank’. The dramatic incident unfolded in the vicinity of Stepove, near Avdiivka in northeastern Ukraine, with digital witnesses documenting the showdown in viral videos showing the relentless firing of the Bradley’s 25mm chain gun upon the Russian T-90M.
David vs Goliath: The Unexpected Victory
The Ukrainian crew, composed of commander and gunner Serhiy and driver Oleksandr, was on their second mission together when they encountered the formidable tank. Despite the evident disparity in firepower and armor, the Bradley crew demonstrated exceptional ingenuity by targeting the T-90M’s optics, effectively blinding and crippling the tank. The incapacitated machine met its end when it crashed into a tree.
The Heroes Behind the Wheel
The crew members, who brought distinct military backgrounds to their shared mission, recounted the high-intensity experience of the battle. Before operating the Bradley, one served as a teacher in civilian life and the other honed his skills as a motorcycle mechanic. Their victory underscores not only the effectiveness of the Bradley vehicle but also the invaluable role of teamwork and synergy in navigating combat situations.
The Bradley: A Force To Be Reckoned With
This successful engagement against the T-90M, despite the typical mismatch in firepower and armor, has painted the Bradley in a new light. Reports suggest that Russian soldiers have developed an apprehension of the US-supplied Bradley fighting vehicles, a testament to their speed, maneuverability, and heavy armor. As the Bradley continues to prove its worth on the battlefield, it serves as a beacon of hope and resilience in the ongoing conflict.
